doCompilation

protected CompilationResult doCompilation(java.lang.Iterable<javax.tools.JavaFileObject> compilationUnits)
Actually performs compilation. Compiler expects sources in UTF-8 encoding. Also compiler generates full debugging info for classes.

Parameters:
compilationUnits - Units that will be compiled
Returns:
CompilationResult with compiledClasses
Throws:
java.lang.RuntimeException - if compilation failed with errros
